# Simulation of the distribution of the Dickey Fuller test statistic 

```{r}
TT <-  100
n <- 50
S <- 10000
phi <- 0.8
```

```{r}
alpha_f <- function(y){
  ax1 <- 0
  ax2 <- 0 
  for(i in 1:(length(y)-1)){
    ax1 <- ax1 + y[i]*y[i+1]
    ax2 <- ax2 + y[i]*y[i]
  }
  alpha <- ax1/ax2 - 0.2
  return(alpha)
}

s_f <- function(y, alpha){
  axs <- 0
  ax <- 0
  for(i in  1:(length(y)-1)){
    axs <- axs + (y[i+1]-y[i]-alpha*y[i])^2
    ax <- ax + y[i]^2
  }
  axs <- axs/(length(y)-1)
  ax <- ax^0.5
  s <- axs/ax
  return(s)
}

t_f <- function(y){
  alp <- alpha_f(y)
  s <- s_f(y, alp)
  t <- alp/s
  return(t)
}
```

```{r}
axi <- 1
all_t <- list()

for(j in 1:S){
  wn <- rnorm(TT+n)
  y <- rep(0, TT+n)
  for(i in 1:(TT+n-1)){
    y[i+1] <- phi*y[i]+wn[i]
  }

  for(i in 1:n){
    all_t[[axi]] <- t_f(y[i:TT+i])
    axi <- axi+1
  }
}
```

```{r}
t_num <- unlist(all_t)
hist(t_num)
```

### 2.3 Intercept

```{r}
interc <- 10

axi <- 1
all_t <- list()

for(j in 1:S){
  wn <- rnorm(TT+n)
  y <- rep(0, TT+n)
  y[1] <- interc
  for(i in 1:(TT+n-1)){
    y[i+1] <- interc+phi*y[i]+wn[i]
  }

  for(i in 1:n){
    all_t[[axi]] <- t_f(y[i:TT+i])
    axi <- axi+1
  }
}
```

```{r}
t_num <- unlist(all_t)
hist(t_num)
```
